org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.addressing
Interface IAeAddressingHeaders

All Superinterfaces:
IAeWsAddressingHeaders, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeAddressingHeaders
public interface IAeAddressingHeaders
extends IAeWsAddressingHeaders

Extension of IAeWsAddressingHeaders that deals with overlapping endpoint definitions in reference properties

Method Detail

addHeaderElement

public void addHeaderElement(org.w3c.dom.Element aElement)
                      throws AeWsAddressingException
Adds a WS-Addressing header to this instance. If the element is a known WS-Addressing header, the value of the appropriate member variable is updated. Otherwise, it is added as a ReferenceProperty.

Parameters:
aElement -
Throws:
AeWsAddressingException

setReferenceProperties

public void setReferenceProperties(java.util.List aElementList)
                            throws AeWsAddressingException
Sets the reference properties for this instance. Any WSA headers embedded in the list of reference properties will override the appropriate member variable as opposed to blindly adding it to the list.

Parameters:
aElementList - the list of reference properties to serialize as headers.
Throws:
AeWsAddressingException
